name: Lumberjack (KGeib, andre.gugelmin)
description:
In yet another routine of a Lumberjack's day, on your way back home, you find a fox with some mystical aura in it that is on the verge of death and, in an inexplicable way, the fox gave you information of where you should go to rescue it, but there is a catch though, the bad guys who attacked it are still on the way...

-------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

  • To Move:  WASD 
  • To Attack:  Left mouse click
  • To Destroy Obstacle:  E 

TEAM

  • Valquiria Geib (KGeib)
    • Game Designer
    • Sound Designer
    • UX/UI Designer
  • Angelo Schiel
    • Artist
  • André Gugelmin
    • Programmer
    • Vfx designer
